Title: üöÄ‚úÖ Brotherlylend ICO ‚úÖ BroCoin ‚úÖ BRCToken ‚úÖüöÄ
Body: Brotherlylend  ICO Revolutionary Blockchain-Based Decentralised Loan Secured By Crypto-Assets.Building A Community Trusted & Ethical Platform Borrowing & Lending Like Never Before 0% Interest   Don‚Äôt miss out to subscribe us for our #ICO at: https://brotherlylend.com/   BrotherlyLend is the new innovative and revolutionary secured lending platform, which allows everyday people with investments in cryptocurrency to take out loans using cryptocurrency as secured assets. The platform provides loans in fiat currencies from around the world-holding user‚Äôs cryptocurrency for them as collateral in a secure wallet. While your average wallet just keeps user‚Äôs cryptocurrency on their behalf BrotherlyLend gives, the opportunity to take out loans 0% Interest. Once the loaned sum is repaid, we will release funds for users or they can take out another loan.    Check Commercial, Roadmap and Technological Details in Whitepaper   NEW CRYPTOCURRENCY IS HERE:  PRE-SALE IS STARTING ON 1st September 2018 Author: BrotherlyLend
Title: üöÄ‚úÖ Brotherlylend ICO ‚úÖ BroCoin ‚úÖ BRCToken ‚úÖüöÄ
Body: Brotherlylend -  Hi  It‚Äôs Sharmarke Mohamed I would like to address you directly regarding your comment above. I would like to inform you that the team section on our site, the one you mentioned, those picture was used as templates. As anyone with the basic understanding of website building knows templates are used to get a visual for senior management to approve. In this case I personally decided not have a team section on our home page in order to be different than others . Brotherlylend ICO was lunched September 1st 2018 as you appreciate websites are regularly backed up for security reason and regularly updated. the version you saw at the time you visited the website was incorrectly uploaded which was rectified immediately once notified.  I would have appreciated it if you would have contacted us and inquired before making slandering comment which can hurt our reputation. I‚Äôm sure any question you may have would have been addressed accordingly.  I would suggest in future if you do plan to make a review of any project and you have doubts it wouldn‚Äôt hurt to ask direct questions to management ( Ethical thing to do ). If your not satisfied with your response then by all means express your opinion about the project and hope others do there own research.  Just a brotherly advice.  If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact me directly on my LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/in/sharmarkejamal/ and hope to see more ethical review from you on other ICO projects.  Regards  Sharmarke Mohamed
